Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Wakeforest Drive, just west of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: Wakeforest Drive runs north and south past the eastern City Walls, which run parallel to Wakeforest on the east side of the road. On the west side of the road is the Dwarven Shrine of Moradin, the creator god of the dwarven race. All dwarves in the city are required to make an annual pilgrimage to the Shrine to give thanks or repentance to the god. The Oceancrest Orphanage is further south on Wakeforest Drive.
